news.title: Juicy Swapper
news.body:
Welcome, you now can
create your own account for
Juicy Swapper! Why create an account?
A Juicy account provides more options
then a guest would have!

patchnotes.body:
[#] Added Mecha Cuddle Master
[#] Added Mecha Cuddle Master(Midnight)
[#] Added Mecha Cuddle Master(Royale)
[#] Added Kelsier
[#] Added Deathstroke Zero
[#] Added Socks
